ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] patch messed up my sound in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: sweet, we got a pair of those shoes last night too.  speaking of drops =) silly me, i went ahead and used some points on a Dragon Claw Main Gauche off SW (2
ygData.messageBody:
sweet, we got a pair of those shoes last night too. speaking of drops =)
silly me, i went ahead and used some points on a Dragon Claw Main Gauche off
SW (2 dropped, only myself and a ranger wanted them). i am very low on
points after getting my SSS, so i just wanted something from VP just
because, ya know to have SOMETHING hehe, not that this sword ain't nice.
so then next thing i know Hosh comes along and i use some more points on a
Veldrak's Shortblade! (no one wanted it) now i don't know which to use!
(have to keep SSS in primary hand). ya i know i got it rough =p

SW drops a nice hammer for ya Halana, good luck in there.

Shada

> My online
> monk hubby (hush all you eq-love cynics!) got some great
> haste slippers.. us
> shaman are hoping for something equally as good for us!
>
> Good luck to you this weekend and my you have some uber-bard drops!!!
>
> Halana, 57th Shaman
> Tani, 35th Bard
> Solusek Ro
